snippet: After years of increasing, alternative investments like private equity and venture capital funds fell from 54 percent of assets to 47 percent of college endowments.
abstract: Study released by the National Assn of College and University Business Officers and the firm Commonfund finds that college endowments reversed a long-term trend toward alternative investments like private equity and venture capital funds.
lead_paragraph: After years of increasing, alternative investments like private equity and venture capital funds fell from 54 percent of assets to 47 percent of college endowments.

headline.main: Growing Endowments Change Colleges’ Investment Strategy

keywords.value: National Assn of College and University Business Officers
keywords.name: organizations
